DataElement.preferredName: Supplemental Qualifiers for Exposure as Collected Administered Concentration Dose
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the amount of study agent per amount of solute delivered to a patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Supplemental Qualifiers for Exposure as Collected Administered Concentration Dose
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the exposure as collected domain.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._The quantity of a substance per unit volume or weight; a measure of the amount of substance present in a unit amount of mixture, particularly, the amount of solute dissolved in a solvent. The amounts can be expressed as moles, masses, volumes, or parts._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

The quantity of a substance per unit volume or weight; a measure of the amount of substance present in a unit amount of mixture, particularly, the amount of solute dissolved in a solvent. The amounts can be expressed as moles, masses, volumes, or parts.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
